text: This is a list of films made by Paramount Pictures and released in the 1930s. All movies (with few exceptions) are currently owned by Universal Television via EMKA, Ltd. ==1930== Release date Title January 4, 1930 Applause January 11, 1930 The Kibitzer Behind the Make-Up
